Class JIPipeAlgorithmRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hkijena.jipipe.api.registries.JIPipeAlgorithmRegistry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JIPipeValidatable

    public class JIPipeAlgorithmRegistry
extends Object
implements JIPipeValidatable
    Manages known algorithms and their annotations
